entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as kneeling in Sirius's old bedroom and reading an old letter from Lily. He is also shown to be in the headmaster's study talking to Phineas Nigellus.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as being hit by a spell intended for Snape's wand hand.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as having an old bedroom where Snape was kneeling.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as writing a letter to Snape and being referred to in the letter by Grindelwald.

entities.name: gellert grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is mentioned as having written a letter to Lily.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is shown talking to Snape in the headmaster's study.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as being in a photograph with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being in a photograph with James.

entities.name: granger girl
entities.description: The Granger girl is mentioned as mentioning the Forest of Dean.

entities.name: forest of dean
entities.description: The Forest of Dean is mentioned as a place where Harry and others are camping.

relationships.description: Snape read an old letter from Lily.
Phineas Nigellus talked to Snape in the headmaster's study.
The Granger girl mentioned the Forest of Dean.
Snape missed George with a spell.
Grindelwald wrote a letter to Lily.
